title: Welcome home to this terrific one bedroom residence at the timeless
description: Welcome home to this terrific one bedroom residence at the timeless 2601 Parkway Condominium. Built in 1940 and designed with a heavy Art Deco influence by Paul Phillipe Cret, this classic Philadelphia building is centrally located in the leafy Fairmount Art Museum neighborhood and within walking distance to Center City. Enter the building and breeze past the attended concierge desk before taking the elevator to your condo. Once inside, beautiful parquet wood floors lead you into a bright and open living room and kitchen. The upgraded kitchen features a white tiled backsplash, dark modern cabinets with stainless hardware, and stainless steel appliances, including a gas range and dishwasher. The premium stone countertops add a layer of sophistication to this hearth of the home while the breakfast bar island provides another area to enjoy meals from. The spacious living room features two large windows and has room enough for most living room sets. Bring along your three seat couch or sectional, additional chair or small loveseat, and media console! The current resident has even fashioned a desk into the living room. After a busy day of city life, retreat to your corner bedroom which comes complete with a spacious closet and en suite tiled bathroom.

title: IMAGINE gazing down from above, watching the never ending rush of veh

title: WELCOME TO BRIDGEVIEW! LOCATED IN BUSTLING OLD CITY!
description:
SHORT TERM 6 MONTH LEASE. Welcome to Bridgeview! Located in bustling Old City, on a quiet cobblestone street, is a renovated, top floor loft for you to call home. The building features high quality amenities including roof deck, garage parking, 24 hour concierge service, and a thriving association of owners. Your new home, unit 616, is bathed in natural light and features the high ceilings and exposed brick walls of your dreams. Enter the unit and find ample storage by the door before moving toward the kitchen, notice the hardwood floors throughout. You’ll first find an updated kitchen with a fresh new backsplash, stainless steel appliances and tons of storage. From here, you’ll enter the open living space with plenty of room for a dining table and living room set. Notice the size of these windows! You’ll find more closet storage on the way to the full bath that features stone tile and radiant heating in the floors. Next, is the large primary bedroom with two huge windows and more exposed brick. Another closet here for additional storage. Lastly you’ll find a BONUS room that is perfect for a nursery, home office, gym, dressing room, yoga room, guest bedroom or whatever you desire to make of it! Unit 616 comes with a 3x6 storage unit on the 6th floor (near the elevator and unit). GARAGE PARKING AVAILABLE FOR ADDITIONAL $250/ MO. Easy access to the Market Frankford Line, I-95 and the Ben Franklin Bridge make this a commuter's dream and on the evenings and weekends you are in the heart of everything that Old City has to offer including tons of boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants and museums. Don’t miss your opportunity to claim this stylish home for yourself!
315 New St #616
